fields_of_interest: Education and training, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: EMODnet, European Commission Directorate-General for Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (DG MARE) Marine Knowledge 2020 strategy, Copernicus, Horizon 2020 and all other initiatives related to ocean science.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Oceanalysis Ltd, the independent consultancy company owned and operated by Dr Gus Jeans, is an established intermediate user of meteorological and oceanographic data products and services.  Consultancy activities include development and delivery of innovative solutions for end users in the offshore energy industry, including oil, gas and renewables.  This has also involves steering Research and Development  towards tangible applications.
